title: Most scenic golf holes
headline: 18 Best Wow! Golf Holes
description: Golf Magazine's Travelin' Joe Passov has seen thousands of golf holes during his worldwide travels, but not all have left a lasting impression like this one at Cape Kidnappers in New Zealand. Prepare to be wowed.
body: Golf Magazine's Travelin' Joe Passov has seen thousands of golf holes during his worldwide travels, but not all have left a lasting impression like this one at Cape Kidnappers in New Zealand. Prepare to be wowed.
